alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wakulla, southern Leon and northern Franklin Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 345 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 17 miles southwest of Midway to near Woodville. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marks, Crawfordville, Woodville, Tallahassee, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Newport, Shadeville, Brown House, Leon Sinks, Lake Munson, Wakulla Springs, Eight Mile Pond, Panacea, Smith Creek, Medart, Buckhorn, Bloxham, Bethel and Natural Bridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla
